post.text: THANK YOU AMERICA! I LOVE YOU! -DJT

comment.author: Mitchell
comment.text: Donald Trump supporters need to get up from the couch and stop smoking weed and get a job before talking shiit about immigrants

replies.author: Bethany
replies.text: Nice job Mitchell? What does it say on your CandiceIF. Show Respect even to people who don't deserve it.

replies.author: Mitchell
replies.text: I show my respect to America Bethany

replies.author: Lillian
replies.text: Don't worry Mitchell, I don't think Trump supports can hear well or read well. With all these facts in front of them they still think he's qualified.

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: I don't smoke weed and I have an excellent job...
